articles.title: Amazon's first physical store outside the US doesn't have a checkout line
articles.description: There's something unusual about Amazon's first physical store outside the United States: No waiting to pay.

articles.title: Janet Jackson two-part documentary set to air on A&E and Lifetime
articles.description: Janet Jackson is getting the star treatment with a two-night documentary event that will air simultaneously on both A&E and Lifetime.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: US-UK trade truce means cheaper whisky for Americans
articles.description: The United States has agreed to suspend tariffs on UK products including Scotch whisky and cashmere as both sides work to resolve a long-running dispute over Boeing and Airbus subsidies.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Undocumented immigrant has burden of proof to challenge deportation order, Supreme Court rules
articles.description: The Supreme Court ruled against an undocumented immigrant on Thursday who has been living in the United States for more than 25 years but faces deportation because of a misdemeanor conviction in state court.

articles.author: Maria Morava and AJ Willingham, CNN
articles.title: More screen time is linked to binge eating in children, US study finds
articles.description: Children in the US who have more screen time are more likely to develop binge eating disorder one year later, a new study found.

articles.author: Nicola Ruotolo, James Frater and Zamira Rahim, CNN
articles.title: Italy blocks export of Covid-19 vaccine doses to Australia, using EU powers for the first time
articles.description: Italy has invoked European Union powers to block the export of 250,000 Covid-19 vaccine doses to Australia, in a dramatic escalation of a dispute between the EU and drug giant AstraZeneca. The country's move marks the first time the powers have been used.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Better late than never: ViacomCBS and Discovery stocks soar thanks to new streaming services
articles.description: Arriving late to the streaming wars is apparently better than never getting involved in them at all. That's what investors seem to think, at least.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Republicans' new strategy? Pointless obstruction.
articles.description: Georgia freshman Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene isn't on any congressional committees. She was stripped of serving on them last month after a series of anti-Semitic and Islamaphobic comments she made prior to her time in Congress came out.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Pope's Iraq visit is risky. 2 religious leaders explain why it's key
articles.description: CNN's Becky Anderson speaks to Archbishop of Westminster Vincent Nichols and Muslim religious scholar Maulana Ali Rizvi about why the Pope's visit to Iraq, which is considered his most dangerous trip so far, is important.
